products.name: Necklace
products.description: A beautiful necklace that adds elegance to any outfit. Crafted with exquisite details and fine materials, this necklace is perfect for special occasions or everyday wear.

products.name: Sofa
products.description: A comfortable and stylish sofa for your living room. This sofa features high-quality upholstery and a modern design, making it a perfect addition to your home.

products.name: Car
products.description: Experience the thrill of driving with our latest car model. With advanced features, safety technologies, and a powerful engine, this car offers an unmatched driving experience.

products.name: Wristwatch
products.description: An elegant wristwatch that combines style and functionality. This timepiece is perfect for any occasion and ensures you're always on time in style.

products.name: Smartphone
products.description: Stay connected with the latest smartphone technology. This smartphone offers advanced features, a high-resolution screen, and a powerful camera for capturing your moments.

products.name: Coffee Maker
products.description: Brew your favorite coffee with ease using our high-quality coffee maker. With multiple brewing options, you can enjoy your perfect cup of coffee every morning.

products.name: Headphones
products.description: Immerse yourself in your favorite music with our comfortable headphones. These headphones offer clear audio and a comfortable fit for long listening sessions.

products.name: Laptop
products.description: Enhance your productivity with our powerful laptop. This laptop features a high-performance processor and a sleek design, making it ideal for work and play.

products.name: Backpack
products.description: Carry your essentials in style with our versatile backpack. This backpack offers ample storage space and is designed for comfort, making it suitable for various activities.

products.name: Tablet
products.description: Experience entertainment on the go with our sleek tablet. This tablet offers a high-resolution screen and is perfect for watching movies, playing games, and more.
